about: Safely trace the journey of used cooking oils with the power of blockchain technology.
uploadFileInfo: Drag and drop the file or click to select
insufficientBalance: Insufficient balance to cover gas cost
wifCidStored: The WIF file was uploaded to the ipfs network and its cid was stored on the smart contract
fileErrorMessage: Please upload a valid file before proceeding
wrongRfj: The RFJ code entered does not correspond to any stored file
getWifPlaceholder: Enter the serial number of a document
